# 3xAAA Battery Pack with Switch

<a href="power3xAAA.png" target="_blank" >
<img src="power3xAAA_preview.png" alt="3xAAA Battery Box with Switch"/>
</a>

This is the battery packed used as part of of our [Persistence of Vision](../project/pov/build.html) project, but can be used to power all of our @ShrimpingIt project builds.

## Sourcing

The component and wholesaler information for this project are linked below. Click the ***Add To Cart*** button above for supply through our [retail bagging service](../bagging.html) to avoid the hassle of self-sourcing.

We purchased the latest 1000 battery packs in our current stock through a one-time bulk deal from an Aliexpress supplier we no longer recommend following customer service issues. However the hardware itself is high-quality, and we were previously using 3xAAA Battery packs with switch to an almost identical specification from Rapid Electronics  which can be [found here](http://www.rapidonline.com/Electrical-Power/Battery-Box-3-X-AAA-with-Switch-18-2901)
